# XMLNode.Options

**Structure**

These constants are input and output options for all `NSXMLNode` objects (unless otherwise indicated), including [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLDocument] objects. You can specify these options in the `NSXMLNode` methods [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/init(kind:options:)] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/xmlString(options:)].

## Declaration

```swift
struct Options
```

## Overview

The options with “Preserve” in their names are applicable only when external sources of XML are parsed; they have no effect on node objects that are programmatically created. Other options are used in initialization and output methods of `NSXMLDocument`; see the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLDocument] reference documentation for details.

## Constants

- **documentIncludeContentTypeDeclaration**: Includes a content type declaration for HTML or XHTML in the output of the document.
- **documentTidyHTML**: Formats HTML into valid XHTML during processing of the document.
- **documentTidyXML**: Changes malformed XML into valid XML during processing of the document.
- **documentValidate**: Validates this document against its DTD (internal or external) or XML Schema.
- **documentXInclude**: Replaces all XInclude nodes in the document with the nodes referred to.
- **nodeCompactEmptyElement**: Requests that an element should be contracted when empty; for example, `<flag/>`.
- **nodeExpandEmptyElement**: Requests that an element should be expanded when empty; for example, `<flag></flag>`. This is the default.
- **nodeIsCDATA**: Specifies that a text node contains and is written out as a CDATA section.
- **nodeLoadExternalEntitiesAlways**: Requests that external entities are always loaded.
- **nodeLoadExternalEntitiesNever**: Requests that external entities are never loaded.
- **nodeLoadExternalEntitiesSameOriginOnly**: Requests that external entities are always loaded and only applies when a URL has been provided.
- **nodeNeverEscapeContents**
- **nodePreserveAll**
- **nodePreserveAttributeOrder**: Requests that NSXMLNode preserve the order of attributes as in the source XML.
- **nodePreserveCDATA**: Requests that NSXMLNode preserve CDATA blocks where defined in the input XML.
- **nodePreserveCharacterReferences**: Specifies that character references (`&#`*nnn*`;`) should not be resolved for XML output of this node.
- **nodePreserveDTD**: Specifies that declarations in a DTD should be preserved until it the DTD is modified. For example, parameter entities are by default expanded; with this option, they are written out as they originally occur in the DTD.
- **nodePreserveEmptyElements**: Specifies that empty elements in the input XML be preserved in their contracted or expanded form.
- **nodePreserveEntities**: Specifies that entities (`&`*xyz*`;`) should not be resolved for XML output of this node.
- **nodePreserveNamespaceOrder**: Requests NSXML to preserve the order of namespace URI definitions as in the source XML.
- **nodePreservePrefixes**: Requests NSXMLNode not to choose prefixes based on the closest namespace URI definition.
- **nodePreserveQuotes**: Specifies that the quoting style used in the input XML (single or double quotes) be preserved.
- **nodePreserveWhitespace**: Requests NSXMLNode to preserve whitespace characters (such as tabs and carriage returns) in the XML source that are not part of node content.
- **nodePrettyPrint**: Print this node with extra space for readability. (Output)
- **nodePromoteSignificantWhitespace**
- **nodeUseDoubleQuotes**: Requests that NSXML use double quotes for the value of an attribute or namespace node. This is the default.
- **nodeUseSingleQuotes**: Requests that NSXML use single quotes for the value of an attribute or namespace node.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Constants

- **XMLNode.Kind**: `NSXMLNode` declares the following constants of type NSXMLNodeKind for specifying a node’s kind in the initializer methods [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/init(kind:)] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/init(kind:options:)]:

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
